Text: Basic handling of te emulator: From the menu, choose file->open and select the game you want to play. Choose config->input from the menu to set the controls. By default, the arrow keys on the keyboard are used as well as "ctrl" (button B), "alt" (button A), "tab" (select button) and "return" (start button). I'd recommend to use an external keypad instead. Hold down "alt" and press "return" to switch between windowed and fullscreen mode.
